_description: Health of body and soul — six lines with added 7th line between 2 and 3

CamTCC323.First Lines:
Liuis firist & licames heleþine sumes heir to
                    beten& þine soule to saluen…
CamTCC323.Last Lines:
…To heowene crist þe sendeÞer blisse is bouten
                    hende
CamTCC323.Note:
Includes (?)colophon?, ‘God turneþe to þen ilke
                    þinke / þat þe is best to lif & to
                    [soule?]’.
CamTCC323.Editions:
Person,  Henry Axel. 
             Cambridge Middle English Lyrics.
         Seattle: University of Washington Press, 1953; rev. ed. 1962: 26.
